tool_description: This API shows in real time the latest news of the forest fires around the world.
name: Forest Fires Now
title: Forest Fires Now

api_list.name: Individual Forest Fires api
api_list.description: Get the latest news on forest fires around the world from a single source.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://forest-fires-now.p.rapidapi.com/news/wildfiretoday"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "forest-fires-now.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://forest-fires-now.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "forest-fires-now.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
